fields.name: CapacityLimit
fields.description: The maximum capacity of an auto scale v-core resource.

fields.name: CapacityObjectId
fields.description: The object ID of the capacity resource associated with the auto scale v-core resource.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The current deployment state of an auto scale v-core resource. The provisioningState is to indicate states for resource provisioning.
